original_text: They say, ‘Why does the Lord try to teach us like that? Who does he think that we are? He speaks to us as if we are babies! He thinks that we have just left our mother's breast!
korean_text: 그들이 이르기를 그가 누구에게 지식을 가르치며 누구에게 도를 전하여 깨닫게 하려는가 젖 떨어져 품을 떠난 자들에게 하려는가

sentences.original_text: Why does the Lord try to teach us like that?
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 어찌하여 그런 방식으로 우리를 가르치려 하시는가?

sentences.original_text: Who does he think that we are?
He thinks that we have just left
